Mentioned having a great time together

notable_quotes: wondering if the fact that so many people are on anti-depressant, adhd, and other drugs, is what makes trump appealing and his flaws invisible...
Will you have a cabinet position?
too far to tell, we will know much more come oct 15

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present - appears to be casual personal correspondence

analysis.summary: This email chain shows casual personal correspondence between Linda Stone and Jeffrey Epstein discussing personal moves, political speculation about the 2016 election, and general catch-up, with Stone jokingly asking if Epstein would have a cabinet position.
